birth_place.zh-cn: 新山, 柔佛, 马来联邦

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚政治人物，曾担任马来西亚第五任副首相、马来西亚驻联合国代表及森那美主席。
description.en: A Malaysian politician who served as the 5th Deputy Prime Minister of Malaysia, Malaysian Representative to the United Nations, and Chairman of Sime Darby.

description.zh-cn: 1895年至1946年间存在于马来半岛的英国保护国联邦，是慕沙希淡的出生地。
description.en: A federation of British protectorates in the Malay Peninsula from 1895 to 1946, and the birthplace of Musa Hitam.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚的一个州属，慕沙希淡的出生地所在州。
description.en: A state in Malaysia where Musa Hitam was born.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚柔佛州的首府，慕沙希淡的出生地。
description.en: The capital city of Johor, Malaysia, and the birthplace of Musa Hitam.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚的一个政党联盟，慕沙希淡曾是其成员。
description.en: A political coalition in Malaysia of which Musa Hitam was a member.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚的主要政党之一，慕沙希淡于1971年重新加入，并曾担任副主席等职务。
description.en: One of Malaysia's major political parties, which Musa Hitam rejoined in 1971 and later served as deputy president.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚政府的第二高职位，慕沙希淡于1981年至1986年担任此职务。
description.en: The second highest office in the Malaysian government, a position held by Musa Hitam from 1981 to 1986.

nodes.id: 阿末沙 (马来西亚最高元首)

zh-cn: 阿末沙 (马来西亚最高元首)

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚第七任最高元首，是慕沙希淡担任副首相期间的国家元首之一。
description.en: The 7th Yang di-Pertuan Agong of Malaysia, one of the heads of state during Musa Hitam's tenure as Deputy Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚第八任最高元首，是慕沙希淡担任副首相期间的国家元首之一。
description.en: The 8th Yang di-Pertuan Agong of Malaysia, one of the heads of state during Musa Hitam's tenure as Deputy Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚第四任及第七任首相。慕沙希淡在其第一个任期内担任副首相。
description.en: The 4th and 7th Prime Minister of Malaysia. Musa Hitam served as his Deputy Prime Minister during his first term.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚政治人物，接替慕沙希淡担任马来西亚第六任副首相。
description.en: A Malaysian politician who succeeded Musa Hitam as the 6th Deputy Prime Minister of Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 国际性政府间组织，慕沙希淡曾担任马来西亚驻该组织的代表。
description.en: An international intergovernmental organization where Musa Hitam once served as Malaysia's representative.

description.zh-cn: 由马哈迪·莫哈末领导的马来西亚内阁，慕沙希淡在此期间担任副首相。
description.en: The Malaysian cabinet led by Mahathir Mohamad, in which Musa Hitam served as Deputy Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚的一家跨国企业集团，慕沙希淡曾担任其主席。
description.en: A Malaysian multinational conglomerate for which Musa Hitam served as Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚第一任首相，巫统前领导人，其接班人为敦阿都拉萨。
description.en: The first Prime Minister of Malaysia and former leader of UMNO, succeeded by Tun Abdul Razak.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚第二任首相，接替东姑阿都拉曼成为巫统领导人。
description.en: The second Prime Minister of Malaysia, who succeeded Tunku Abdul Rahman as the leader of UMNO.

description.zh-cn: 位于英国的一所公立研究型大学，慕沙希淡是其校友。
description.en: A public research university in the United Kingdom, of which Musa Hitam is an alumnus.

description.zh-cn: 1971年重新加入巫统，后成为联盟的国会副党鞭，并于1978年当选为巫统副主席。
description.en: Rejoined UMNO in 1971, later became the coalition's Deputy Whip in Parliament, and was elected UMNO Deputy President in 1978.

description.zh-cn: 在马哈迪·莫哈末担任首相期间，慕沙希淡担任其副手。
description.en: Musa Hitam served as deputy to Mahathir Mohamad during the latter's premiership.

relationships.target: 阿末沙 (马来西亚最高元首)

description.zh-cn: 在苏丹阿末沙担任最高元首期间，慕沙希淡是政府的副首相。
description.en: During Sultan Ahmad Shah's reign as Yang di-Pertuan Agong, Musa Hitam was the Deputy Prime Minister of the government.

description.zh-cn: 在苏丹马末·依斯干达担任最高元首期间，慕沙希淡是政府的副首相。
description.en: During Sultan Mahmud Iskandar's reign as Yang di-Pertuan Agong, Musa Hitam was the Deputy Prime Minister of the government.

description.zh-cn: 慕沙希淡接替马哈迪·莫哈末出任马来西亚副首相。
description.en: Musa Hitam succeeded Mahathir Mohamad as the Deputy Prime Minister of Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 嘉化·峇峇接替慕沙希淡出任马来西亚副首相。
description.en: Ghafar Baba succeeded Musa Hitam as the Deputy Prime Minister of Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 1971年，慕沙希淡重新加入由时任领导人敦阿都拉萨领导的巫统。
description.en: In 1971, Musa Hitam rejoined UMNO under the leadership of its then leader, Tun Abdul Razak.

description.zh-cn: 敦阿都拉萨是东姑阿都拉曼在巫统的接班人。
description.en: Tun Abdul Razak was Tunku Abdul Rahman's successor in UMNO.
